Dating: LATE PERIOD (not before); GRAECO-ROMAN PERIOD (not after)
Name: Harpocrates
Description: This small amulet is part of the collection of E. Meester de Ravestein. Harpocrates is generally represented naked, the head shaven, but provided with the "sidelock of youth" which falls on the right shoulder. With Osiris and Isis, the god-child placing the finger on the mouth formed the most important triad spreading throughout all the ancient world of the mediterranean.
